actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Budget.

official_title: A resolution setting forth the congressional budget for the United States Government for the fiscal year 1979.

summary.text: Sets forth the congressional budget for the United States Government for fiscal year 1979. States that the recommended level of Federal revenues is $464,148,000,000 and the appropriate level of total budget outlays is $464,148,000,000. States that the amount by which the aggregate level of Federal revenues should be decreased is $29,500,000,000. States that the appropriate level of total new budget authority is $519,046,000. Establishes the appropriate level of the public debt at $798,300,000,000. Sets forth the appropriate level of new budget authority and the estimated budget outlays for each major functional category.

titles.title: A resolution setting forth the congressional budget for the United States Government for the fiscal year 1979.
